raw_text: FERNANDO – REV. PREMASIRI – (Methodist Church of Sri Lanka). Called to rest. Beloved husband of late Indrani,​ much loved father of Pragathi and Priyadarshani (Dubai),​ Harini and Ramesh (TCI Group),​ Devan and Nelumi (UK). Remains lie at 232/​5,​ Uyana Road,​ Lunawa,​ Moratuwa on Monday,​ 18th December from 5:00 p.m. onwards. Service at the residence to take place on Tuesday,​ 19th December at 10:15 a.m. Cortege leaves residence at 10.45 a.m. for service at Methodist Church,​ Moratumulla at 11.00 am. Thereafter,​ burial at Church Cemetery.083610

COORAY – BHADRANI – Beloved wife of Lakshman – (Chairman,​ E.H. Cooray & Sons Ltd /​ Lakshman Group),​ loving mother of Roshini,​ mother-in-law of Dinesh Dharmadasa,​ precious grandmother of Diroshan,​ Deelaka & Reshmi,​ daughter of late Mr & Mrs G.L.P. de Silva of Ambalangoda,​ daughter-in-law of late Mr & Mrs E.H. Cooray of Moratuwa. Cortege leaves residence 118,​ Rosmead Place,​ Colombo 7 at 4.30 p.m. on Tuesday,​ 19th December for cremation at 5.30 p.m. at General Cemetery,​ Kanatte. (New Crematorium).083679

JAYAWARDHANA – Major General Deshamanya ASOKA KANTHILAL,​ (Former Governor of the Northern & Eastern Provinces,​ former Secretary – Ministry of Defence and former Deputy Chief of Staff – Sri Lanka Army). Dearly beloved husband of late Srima and darling father of Amila and Imali,​ son of late Christie and late Swarna Jayawardhana,​ son-in-law of late Arthur and late Pearl Wijayasingha,​ beloved brother of late Dr. Nihal and of Dr. Ranjan (UK) and Colonel Sarath. Remains lie at A.F. Raymond’s Funeral Parlour,​ Borella. Funeral with full military honours will be held at 3:00 p.m. on Wednesday,​ 20th December for cremation at the General Cemetery,​ Borella at 4:30 p.m. (New Crematorium).083615
